version_description:
What's new?

We've updated The Spectator's app to give you a simpler, faster reading experience. Our easy to navigate storefront allows you to quickly download your favourite and most recent issues.

• Listen to the Spectator podcast
• Choose to automatically download new editions when connected to Wi-Fi
• Automatically archive editions you haven't read in a while to free up space on your device
• Save your favourite pages and articles to your own scrapbook
• Better font resizing options
• Share articles via social media and email
• Long hold on an edition to quickly archive it

What's new?

We've updated The Spectator's app to give you a simpler, faster reading experience. Our easy to navigate storefront allows you to quickly download your favourite and most recent issues.

• Listen to the Spectator podcast
• Choose to automatically download new editions when connected to Wi-Fi
• Automatically archive editions you haven't read in a while to free up space on your device
• Save your favourite pages and articles to your own scrapbook
• Better font resizing options
• Share articles via social media and email
• Long hold on an edition to quickly archive it

- Updated subscription help copy
- Download improvements

Notifications when device memory is running low so users can manage their stored editions.

Improvements to support iPhone X screen resolution.

This update includes the introduction of a live news feed section. Regular readers of the weekly magazine editions can now also enjoy a selection of news articles delivered straight from The Spectator Website. We've also improved the general appearance and navigation - letting you explore the week's digital edition, downloaded editions and latest stories more easily.
- Update to optimise your web site login journey within the app

- You can now discover and play The Spectator podcasts straight from the Spectator app
- Various design changes in order to make your overall experience more enjoyable
